price: 6. En hoeveel profeten hebben Wij gestuurd onder de eerdere volkeren.
arabic: وَكَمۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن نَّبِيّٖ فِي ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wakam arsalnā min nabiyyin fī al-awalīna
